product_name: Rocky Mounts Brass Knuckles Rooftop Bike Mount
long_description: No more tire removal--simply raise the arm, secure it against the front wheel of your road or mountain bike, and then tighten the straps and drive toward your next adventure with confidence.
short_description: No more tire removal--simply raise the arm, secure it against the front wheel of your road or mountain bike, and then tighten the straps and drive toward your next adventure with confidence.
